entry.title: DeFi Kingdoms Goes Live On Avalanche Subnet
entry.summary: DFK launches Crystalvale on Avalanche subnet.

entry.title: Tesla Taps MakerDAO-Powered Lender for $7.8M Real Estate Deal
entry.summary: Tesla is financing a repair center with a MakerDAO-powered loan.

entry.title: European Parliament Passes Bill Requiring Crypto Firms to KYC Non-Custodial Wallets
entry.summary: European crypto firms may soon be forced to implement KYC (Know Your Client) procedures for non-custodial wallets that they transact with.

entry.title: The Best Ethereum Merge Explainer You’ll Ever See
entry.summary: The Ethereum Merge is the biggest story in town right now as the fruit of tireless core developers’ labour receives its final preparations before taking its place as the centrepiece of an enormous blockchain banquet. Will it blend seamlessly or will it burst asunder and make a horrible mess of everything?

entry.title: Vitalik Muses on How PoS Could Have Come Sooner With The Merge Coming Ethereum's Chief Scientist and Muse Takes Stock
entry.summary: With The Merge Coming Ethereum's Chief Scientist and Muse Takes Stock
